import { useFormik } from 'formik'; import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Login() { const validate=(values)=>{ const errors={}; if(values.email){} } const formik=useFormik({ initialValues:{ email:'', password:'' }, validate, onSubmit: values => { alert(JSON.stringify(values, null, 2)); }, }) return (
